description:
Wtf is going on❗️😤😩 While we’re mourning/protesting the assassination of George Floyd from Minnesota 💜 THIS happened right here in YONKERS, NEW YORK 🥺 (three days prior) Knee in the back, while handcuffed; Shakeyma Alford was physically abused by the Yonkers Police Department 💔💔 WHY TF is his knee in her back while cuffed⁉️ This officers abused his power and the actions taken were uncalled for 💯 This is happening ALL over AMERIKKA❗️❗️To BLACK MEN and WOMEN ‼️ #SayHerName #ShakeymaAlford #iStandWithShakeyma #POLICEAREOUTOFCONTROL • #NoSuchThingAsAGoodCop

While the world only has to deal with the CORONAVIRUS. Black people still have to deal with #Racism and #PoliceBrutality. Smh The attack on our people never stops. 
#POPULATIONCONTROL 
#corona  #coronavirus  #Hr6666 #TraceAct #COVID19 #Shutdown #Martiallaw #quarantine  #pandemic #5G #Vaccination

Watch as these gang members show their control over our communities. Using Violence, Aggressive, and Disrespectful words and behavior. They are nothing more then bullies. Most of them are racist. Joining the police allows them the power they want over the people they hate. They get a license to kill and traumatizes our people. THE POLICE ARE THE BIGGEST ORGANIZED GANG. THEY HAVE NEVER STOPPED MOVING AS SLAVE CATCHERS. 
I dont know if the answer is more BLACK cops especially when they hurt us worse. Just to prove they are one of the good ones to their white masters. • Copyright Disclaimer Under Section 107 of the Copyright Act 1976, allowance is made for ""fair use"" for purposes such as criticism. commenting, news reporting, teaching, scholarship, and research. Fair use is a use permitted by copyright statute that might otherwise be infringing. • WE ARE THE #BLACKMEDIA SO WE MUST #CONTROLTHENARRATIVE becuase #ChangingTheNarrative IS OUR RESPONSIBILITY • Follow My PUBLIC PAGE @wecontrolthenarrative  #wecontrolthenarrative AND MY PRIVATE PAGE @Therealremyredd2 #Therealremyredd2 @Bothervex #BotherVex ✊🏾👊🏾 #therealremyredd
